ygData.subject: Re: FW: EverQuest Newsletter - November 1999 [114106880]
ygData.msgSnippet: U got Soulfire yet? just help another guy get his this morning. I gotten 2h mithril sword so not so keen to get it yet. maybe when I get haste sash or that
ygData.messageBody:
U got Soulfire yet? just help another guy get his this morning. I gotten
2h mithril sword so not so keen to get it yet. maybe when I get haste sash
or that haste belt (very unlikely).
----- Original Message -----
From: Entreri <drizzt@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 12:00
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] FW: EverQuest Newsletter - November 1999
[114106880]


> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> Ah well u didnt mention Prexus.. :P
>
> Regards
> Hevan
> Servant of Mithaniel Marr
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: '* Singnet Internet Games Mailing List'
<internet-games@...>;
> '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, November 15, 1999 11:30 AM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] FW: EverQuest Newsletter - November 1999
[114106880]
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >New zone in EQ. Btw, most local players are in Innoruuk server. Come
join
> >us if you also play EQ ;)
> >
> >Ziltus Planeswalker
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: The Station@... [SMTP:station-mailer@...]
> >
> >Greetings, denizen of Norrath! We hope this letter finds you well rested
> >and ready for your next adventure. This is the first monthly EverQuest
> >newsletter from your friends at The Station, where EverQuest reigns as
the
> >No. 1 fantasy role-playing game on the Net.
> >
> >Check out what's new this month in EverQuest and beyond:
> >
> >***A NEW CONTINENT IS DISCOVERED!!!***
> >
> >~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >
> >***A NEW CONTINENT IS DISCOVERED!!!***
> >
> >Intrepid explorers have returned from the edge of the EverQuest world
> >bearing tidings that will forever alter the history of Norrath. A new
> >continent, Kunark, has been found south of Faydwer beyond the Timorous
> >Deep. It is rumored that ships will soon set sail from Antonica and
Faydwer
> >bound for this new world.
> >
> >You will be able to explore this new land in March of 2000, when the The
> >Ruins of Kunark Expansion Pack becomes available. The Ruins of Kunark
> >Expansion Pack will add startling new features to EverQuest, including
more
> >than 20 new zones - lakes, jungles, crypts, dungeons, ancient towers and
> >underground castles.
> >
> >Kunark will contain breathtaking graphics and more object animations such
> >as earthquakes and other violent natural phenomena. There will be a new
> >playable race -- the Iksar (Lizardmen who can play as Monks). And you'll
> >meet visually stunning new creatures such as grey dragons, giant
scorpions
> >and man-eating plants.
> >
> >With the Expansion Pack, you'll even be able to go beyond level 50!
> >
> >For detailed information and tantalizing screenshots, visit the new Ruins
> >of Kunark Web site @ http://www.everquest.com/kunark.
> >
> >~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >
> >>Singapore Everquest Players List
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
